Hello I am Matt Aurich

I am a Business Administration Major with a focus in Entrepreneurship set to graduate in May of 2014 from the University of Texas at Dallas. I currently work part-time doing odd-jobs in both sales and construction. For fun I like to tango, play strategy games, practice martial arts, and small carpentry/DIY projects.


Video Introduction

Let me tell you a little about myself.

Back to top

Vogel Alcove Non-Profit Consultation

Through this project I learned how to better work in a group to accomplish a set goal. Our goal was to create recommendations for alternative revenue streams for Vogel Alcove, a local non-profit. To accomplish this we met with Vogel Alcove and took the ideas generated at the meeting to create several different business strategies.


Google Adword Pre-Campaign Report See for yourself.

This project and the course through which it was assigned has taught me the value of online marketing and the different venues through which you can market your business. This project mainly focused on the running of a google adwords campaign for a local business, through which I learned how to develop the correct keywords and cater advertisements to achieve a higher CTR while maintaining a low CPC.


Dunking For Dreams A fundraiser proposal

This was a group project that required collaberation of research and ideas to put together a mock proposal for a local fundraising event. This required an assessment of the needs of a school in a low income district. After which we examined the required resources to meet those need and created a proposal to obtain the required funding

Tango Life is like dancing... many people will dance. Some will get angry when the rhythm changes. But life is changing all the time.

Learning to tango has taught me alot about developing a strong lead that listens and adapts to the follower and the environment
